trans-unit.source: 1) == is used to compare primitives.

trans-unit.source: .equals() evaluates to the comparison of values in the objects
trans-unit.target: .equals() 计算对象中值的比较

trans-unit.source: .equals(...) will only compare what it is written to compare, no more, no less.
trans-unit.target: .equals(...) 将只比较它要比较的内容，不会多也不会少。

trans-unit.source: == can be used in many object types but you can use Object.equals for any type , especially Strings and Google Map Markers.
trans-unit.target: == 可以用于许多对象类型，但是您可以将 Object.equals 用于任何类型，尤其是字符串和Google Map Markers。

trans-unit.source: == is a reference comparison, i.e. both objects point to the same memory location
trans-unit.target: == 是参考比较，即两个对象都指向相同的存储位置

trans-unit.source: == is an operator and equals() is a method.
trans-unit.target: == 是一个运算符， equals() 是一个方法。

trans-unit.source: equals() is a method inherited from Object class. This method by default compares if two objects have the same referece. It means:
trans-unit.target: equals() 是从 Object 类继承的方法。默认情况下，此方法比较两个对象是否具有相同的引用。它的意思是：

trans-unit.source: null will be printed after executing the previous code if you haven't implemented hashCode().
trans-unit.target: null 如果尚未实现 hashCode() ,则在执行之前的代码后将输出null。

trans-unit.source: object1 == object2 compares if the objects referenced by object1 and object2 refer to the same memory location in Heap.
trans-unit.target: object1 == object2 比较由object1和object2引用的对象是否引用了Heap中的相同内存位置。

trans-unit.source: object1.equals(object2) compares the values of object1 and object2 regardless of where they are located in memory.
trans-unit.target: object1.equals(object2) 比较object1和object2的值，而不管它们在memory中的位置。

trans-unit.source: object1.equals(object2)<=>object1 == object2
trans-unit.target: object1.equals(object2) <=> object1 == object2

trans-unit.source: Here is a general thumb of rule for the difference between relational operator == and the method .equals().
trans-unit.target: 这是 relational operator == 与 the method .equals() 的区别的一般规则。

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of comparing two Strings in Java for equality using == and equals() method which will clear some doubts:
trans-unit.target: 这是使用==和equals（）方法比较Java中两个String是否相等的示例，这将消除一些疑问：

trans-unit.source: Scenario 1
trans-unit.target: 场景1

trans-unit.source: Scenario 2
trans-unit.target: 方案2

trans-unit.source: String comparison is a common scenario of using both == and equals method. Since java.lang.String class override equals method, It return true if two String object contains same content but == will only return true if two references are pointing to same object.
trans-unit.target: 字符串比较是同时使用==和equals方法的常见方案。由于java.lang.String类重写equals方法，因此如果两个String对象包含相同的内容，则返回true；但是只有两个引用指向相同的对象时，==才返回true。

trans-unit.source: The String pool (aka interning) and Integer pool blur the difference further, and may allow you to use == for objects in some cases instead of .equals
trans-unit.target: 该字符串池（又名实习）和整数池模糊的差异进一步，并可能允许您使用 == 在某些情况下为对象，而不是的 .equals

trans-unit.source: ==: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/op2.html
trans-unit.target: ==：http : //docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/op2.html

trans-unit.source: Also note that .equals() normally contains == for testing as this is the first thing you would wish to test for if you wanted to test if two objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意， .equals() 通常包含 == 进行测试，因为如果要测试两个对象是否相等，这是您要测试的第一件事。

trans-unit.source: Always remember to override hashCode if you override equals so as not to "break the contract". As per the API, the result returned from the hashCode() method for two objects must be the same if their equals methods show that they are equivalent. The converse is not necessarily true.
trans-unit.target: 如果您重写 equals ，请务必记住重写 hashCode ，以免“违约”。根据API，如果两个对象的 equals 方法显示等效，则 hashCode() 方法返回的结果必须相同。反过来并不一定是真的。

trans-unit.source: And == actually does look at values for primitive types, for objects it checks the reference.
trans-unit.target: 而 == 实际上做一下基本类型值，对象会检查参考。

trans-unit.source: And you will have no problems whatsoever.
trans-unit.target: 你也不会有任何问题。

trans-unit.source: As with any explanation, let it sink in.
trans-unit.target: 如同任何解释一样,让它沉淀下来。

trans-unit.source: Basically, == compares if two objects have the same reference on the heap, so unless two references are linked to the same object, this comparison will be false.
trans-unit.target: 基本上， == 比较两个对象在堆上是否具有相同的引用，因此，除非两个引用链接到同一对象，否则此比较将为false。

trans-unit.source: Both == and .equals() refers to the same object if you don't override .equals().
trans-unit.target: 如果你不覆盖.equals(),==和.equals()都是指同一个对象。

trans-unit.target: 但是， == operator will still return results based on the memory location of the two objects(person1 and person2) 。

trans-unit.source: If a class does not override the equals method, then it defaults to the equals(Object o) method of the closest parent class that has overridden this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个类没有覆盖equals方法，则默认为覆盖了该方法的最近的父类的 equals(Object o) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If no parent classes have provided an override, then it defaults to the method from the ultimate parent class, Object, and so you're left with the Object#equals(Object o) method. Per the Object API this is the same as ==; that is, it returns true if and only if both variables refer to the same object, if their references are one and the same. Thus you will be testing for object equality and not functional equality.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有父类提供重写，则它将默认使用最终父类Object中的方法，因此将剩下 Object#equals(Object o) 方法。根据对象API，这与 == 相同；也就是说，当且仅当两个变量都引用相同的对象且引用相同且相同时，它才返回true 。因此，您将测试对象相等性而不是功能相等性。

trans-unit.source: Implement hashCode() when establishing equality is part of the Java Object Contract. If you are working with collections, and you haven't implemented hashCode(), Strange Bad Things could happen:
trans-unit.target: 建立相等性时，请实现 hashCode() 是Java Object Contract的一部分。如果您使用集合，但尚未实现 hashCode() ，则可能会发生奇怪的坏事：

trans-unit.source: In Java, the == operator compares the two objects to see if they point to the same memory location; while the .equals() method actually compares the two objects to see if they have the same object value.
trans-unit.target: 在Java中， == 运算符比较两个对象以查看它们是否指向相同的内存位置；而 .equals() 方法实际上比较两个对象以查看它们是否具有相同的对象值。

trans-unit.target: 简而言之,答案是 "是"。

trans-unit.source: It may be worth adding that for wrapper objects for primitive types - i.e. Int, Long, Double - == will return true if the two values are equal.
Its your wish what you want to do once you override .equals(). You can compare the invoking object's state with the passed in object's state or you can just call super.equals()
trans-unit.target: 当你重写了.equals()之后,你想做什么是你的愿望。你可以将调用对象的状态与传入对象的状态进行比较,或者你可以直接调用 super.equals()

trans-unit.source: Just remember that .equals(...) has to be implemented by the class you are trying to compare. Otherwise, there isn't much of a point; the version of the method for the Object class does the same thing as the comparison operation: Object#equals.
trans-unit.target: 只要记住， .equals(...) 必须由您要比较的类实现。否则，没有什么意义。Object类方法的版本与比较操作的作用相同：Object＃equals。

trans-unit.source: Main difference between == and equals in Java is that "==" is used to compare primitives while equals() method is recommended to check equality of objects.
trans-unit.target: 在Java中,==和equals的主要区别在于,"=="是用来比较基元的,而equals()方法被推荐用于检查对象的平等性。

trans-unit.target: 好吧,让我们试着回答这个问题。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, the "==" operator compares the value of two object references to see whether they refer to the same String instance. If the value of both object references "refer to" the same String instance then the result of the boolean expression would be "true"..duh. If, on the other hand, the value of both object references "refer to" different String instances (even though both String instances have identical "values", that is, the contents of the character arrays of each String instance are the same) the result of the boolean expression would be "false".
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，“ ==” 运算符比较两个对象引用的值，以查看它们是否引用相同的String实例。如果两个对象的值引用“引用”相同的String实例，则布尔表达式的结果将为“ true” .. duh。另一方面，如果两个对象引用的值“引用” 不同的String实例（即使两个String实例具有相同的“值”，即每个String实例的字符数组的内容相同），则布尔表达式的结果将为“ false”。

trans-unit.source: Operators are generally used for primitive type comparisons and thus == is used for memory address comparison and equals() method is used for comparing objects.
trans-unit.target: 运算符通常用于原始类型比较，因此 == 用于内存地址比较，而 equals() 方法用于比较对象。

trans-unit.source: Since Java doesn’t support operator overloading, == behaves identical for every object but equals() is method, which can be overridden in Java and logic to compare objects can be changed based upon business rules.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">由于Java不支持运算符重载，所以==对于每个对象的行为都相同，但是equals（）是方法，可以在Java中重写该方法，并且可以根据业务规则更改比较对象的逻辑。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: So creating person objects person1 and person2 and for comparing these two using the .equals() I need to override the equals method of the person class to define based on which instance variables(heigh or weight) the comparison will be.
trans-unit.target: 因此，创建人员对象 person1 and person2 并使用 .equals() 比较这两个对象时，我需要重写person类的equals方法，以根据比较的实例变量（heigh或weight）来定义。

trans-unit.source: The == binary operator compares memory addresses.
trans-unit.target: 该 == 二元运算符比较的内存地址。

trans-unit.source: The == operator tests whether two variables have the same references (aka pointer to a memory address).
trans-unit.target: 在==操作符测试两个变量是否有（内存地址也称为指针）相同的标记。

trans-unit.source: The best way to answer this question will be by asking a few questions to yourself. so let's start:
trans-unit.target: 要回答这个问题,最好的方法就是问自己几个问题,所以我们开始吧。

trans-unit.source: The difference between == and equals confused me for sometime until I decided to have a closer look at it. Many of them say that for comparing string you should use equals and not ==. Hope in this answer I will be able to say the difference.
trans-unit.target: ==和equals之间的差异使我困惑了一段时间，直到我决定仔细研究一下。他们中的许多人说，在比较字符串时，应使用 equals 而不是 == 。希望在这个答案中我能够说出区别。

trans-unit.source: The equals method compares the objects.
trans-unit.target: 等价法对对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The equals() method compares the "value" inside String instances (on the heap) irrespective if the two object references refer to the same String instance or not. If any two object references of type String refer to the same String instance then great! If the two object references refer to two different String instances .. it doesn't make a difference. Its the "value" (that is: the contents of the character array) inside each String instance that is being compared.
trans-unit.target: equals（）方法比较String实例内部（在堆上）的“值”，而不管两个对象引用是否引用相同的String实例。如果任何两个String类型的对象引用都引用同一个String实例，那就太好了！如果两个对象引用引用了两个不同的String实例，则没有任何区别。它是被比较的每个String实例内部的“值”（即：字符数组的内容）。

trans-unit.source: The major difference between == and equals() is
trans-unit.target: ==和equals()的主要区别在于

trans-unit.target: 这也是为什么IdentityHashCode对所有人来说都不一样的原因。

trans-unit.source: What is the difference between == and equals() in Java
trans-unit.target: Java中的==和equals()有什么区别?

trans-unit.source: When you evaluate the code, it is very clear that (==) compares according to memory address, while equals(Object o) compares hashCode() of the instances. That's why it is said do not break the contract between equals() and hashCode() if you do not face surprises later.
trans-unit.target: 当你评估这段代码时,很明显,(==)是根据内存地址进行比较,而equals(Object o)是根据实例的hashCode()进行比较。这也是为什么说不要破坏equals()和hashCode()之间的契约,如果你以后不遇到意外的话。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the equals() method tests whether two variables refer to objects that have the same state (values).
trans-unit.target: 而equals（）方法测试两个变量是否引用具有相同状态（值）的对象。

trans-unit.target: 对比对象的基本内容(id)的对象进行比较

trans-unit.source: it's depends's on implementation if we are overridden equals method than it compares object on basic of implementation given in overridden method.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们使用的是重载等价方法,那么它取决于实现,而不是根据重载方法中给出的基本实现来比较对象。

trans-unit.source: java created a string "mango" which was pointed(referenced) by the variable mango something like this
trans-unit.target: java创建了一个字符串 "mango" ，它由变量 mango 指向（引用），类似这样

trans-unit.source: know check out it will return true and false for same case only we overridden
trans-unit.target: 知道检查出它将返回true和false的相同情况下,只有我们重写了

trans-unit.source: still compare references of object.
trans-unit.target: 仍然是比较对象的参照物。

trans-unit.source: we know that if hashcode(x)=N and hashcode(y)=N => x is equal to y
trans-unit.target: 我们知道如果 hashcode(x)=N 并且 hashcode(y)=N => x is equal to y
